templates.template: Veeam Backup and Replication by HTTP
templates.name: Veeam Backup and Replication by HTTP
templates.description:
This template is designed to monitor Veeam Backup and Replication.

NOTE: The RESTful API may not be available for some editions, see (https://www.veeam.com/licensing-pricing.html) for more details.

Setup:
  1. Create a user to monitor the service or use an existing read-only account.
  See (https://helpcenter.veeam.com/docs/backup/vbr_rest/reference/vbr-rest-v1-rev2.html?ver=110#tag/Login/operation/CreateToken!path=grant_type&t=request) for more details. 
  2. Link the template to a host.
  3. Configure the following macros: {$VEEAM.API.URL}, {$VEEAM.USER}, and {$VEEAM.PASSWORD}.

You can discuss this template or leave feedback on our forum https://www.zabbix.com/forum/zabbix-suggestions-and-feedback/

Generated by official Zabbix template tool "Templator"

triggers.expression: length(last(/Veeam Backup and Replication by HTTP/veeam.get.errors))>0
triggers.name: There are errors in requests to API
triggers.description: Zabbix has received errors in response to API requests.

items.name: Get metrics
items.description: The result of API requests is expressed in the JSON.

item_prototypes.name: Job states [{#NAME}] [{#TYPE}]: Last result
item_prototypes.description: The result of the session. The enums used: `None`, `Success`, `Warning`, `Failed`.

item_prototypes.name: Job states [{#NAME}] [{#TYPE}]: Get data
item_prototypes.description: Gets raw data from the job states with the name `[{#NAME}]`.

item_prototypes.name: Job states [{#NAME}] [{#TYPE}]: Status
item_prototypes.description: The current status of the job. The enums used: `running`, `inactive`, `disabled`.

item_prototypes.name: Proxy [{#NAME}] [{#TYPE}]: Max Task Count
item_prototypes.description: The maximum number of concurrent tasks.

item_prototypes.name: Proxy [{#NAME}] [{#TYPE}]: Get data
item_prototypes.description: Gets raw data collected by the proxy with the name `[{#NAME}]`, `[{#TYPE}]`.

item_prototypes.name: Proxy [{#NAME}] [{#TYPE}]: Host name
item_prototypes.description: The name of the proxy server.

item_prototypes.name: Server [{#NAME}]: Get data
item_prototypes.description: Gets raw data collected by the proxy server.

item_prototypes.name: Proxy [{#NAME}] [{#TYPE}]: Host type
item_prototypes.description: The type of the proxy server.

item_prototypes.name: Repository [{#NAME}] [{#TYPE}]: Get data
item_prototypes.description: Gets raw data from repository with the name: `[{#NAME}]`, `[{#TYPE}]`.

item_prototypes.name: Repository [{#NAME}] [{#TYPE}]: Used space [{#PATH}]
item_prototypes.description: Used space by repositories expressed in gigabytes (GB).

item_prototypes.name: Repository [{#NAME}] [{#TYPE}]: Free space [{#PATH}]
item_prototypes.description: Free space of repositories expressed in gigabytes (GB).

item_prototypes.name: Session [{#NAME}] [{#TYPE}]: Message
item_prototypes.description: A message that explains the session result.

item_prototypes.name: Session progress percent [{#NAME}] [{#TYPE}]
item_prototypes.description: The progress of the session expressed as percentage.

item_prototypes.name: Session [{#NAME}] [{#TYPE}]: Get data
item_prototypes.description: Gets raw data from session with the name: `[{#NAME}]`, `[{#TYPE}]`.

item_prototypes.name: Session [{#NAME}] [{#TYPE}]: Result
item_prototypes.description: The result of the session. The enums used: `None`, `Success`, `Warning`, `Failed`.

item_prototypes.name: Session [{#NAME}] [{#TYPE}]: State
item_prototypes.description: The state of the session. The enums used: `Stopped`, `Starting`, `Stopping`, `Working`, `Pausing`, `Resuming`, `WaitingTape`, `Idle`, `Postprocessing`, `WaitingRepository`, `WaitingSlot`.

The Veeam API endpoint is a URL in the format `<scheme>://<host>:<port>`.
A response timeout for the API.
